title: The Art of Decluttering: Learn how to really downsize your life and still keep your sanity
snippet:
I need a 20,000 or more word book on the subject: Declutter . It must be written in Native American Standard English with conversational tone,Story form, entertaining,and free of grammar errors. If you decide to use pictures, the resolution can't be no lower than 200 dpi resolution and the images must be cleared. You must be able to explain a step by step approach and resolution. Your must be able to come up with the subtitle.All material must pass Copyscape once completed. Book must be completed in two weeks.Only I accept Quality books
You must be proficient on the subject matter and provide creditable content. You have to come up with a killer outline and it has to be approve by me.I will provide more details to you once you are awarded the job. When you finish writing the E-book, you must give a 200 word attention grabbing description of the book which includes the keyword I provide you with during the project. I require original writing and a book grammatical free errors. I need in the word document 1.5 paragraph spacing with Georgia .12 fonts. The project is due in two weeks.
